txt.en: Moonlight
Bellflower

'Hullo there! I have gotten myself into a heap of trouble; do you think you can help me? I snuck in and took a basket of eggs when dad wasn't looking... he is very particular about his prized hens and doesn't let me tend them. I just wanted a snack by the river with my friends is all.

'Well, after I snuck out the eggs I realized that they had chicks in them! Dad has been trying to get his prized hens to lay eggs for longer than I can remember; it must be the new rooster he got from Budgeford. I can't go back and return the eggs, but maybe you can! Dad hurt his leg and has so many travellers running about fetching eggs, you would be able to sneak in and replace the ones I took.

'I got so flustered trying to get away with the eggs that I forgot which hen I took them from. I put the eggs in the basket in the order I took them, so all you need to do is figure out what order the hens lay them in. 

'I was able to sneak out a page from my dad's journal -- he can write you know, taught me all my letters -- though I can't make out up from down with his notes. Maybe you will have more luck? 

'Be careful placing the eggs back in the nests... those hens know what eggs are their own and will roll out any that aren't theirs, then you'll have to start over.'
'You got all the eggs matched up with their hens? I can't thank you enough, [placeholder]!'
'Were you able to get all the eggs back in the nests? I would hate for the chicks not to hatch. Remember to look at my dad's notes if you're having trouble.'
Placed the first egg in the proper nest
The hen rolled the egg out of the nest

Cineraria

Talk to Wald Sandson

Farmer Sandson's prize hens are in yard at Sandson's farm.\n\nWald Sandson has asked you to return the eggs for him, so that he will not get caught. You need to place the eggs back in the order they were taken, starting with the first.
The hen rolled the egg out of the nest

Wald Sandson can be found at Sandson's Farm, north and east of Michel Delving.\n\nHaving replaced all the eggs, you should return and speak with Wald Sandson.
